item.title: MCU Casting Director Opens Up About Casting The Avengers & Its “Electrifying” Results
item.description: With most of the original Avengers now back in the MCU, the casting director who got them into the franchise opens up on how Marvel chose the heroes.

item.title: After Enola Holmes & Watson, It's Only A Matter Of Time Until This Other Sherlock Character Gets Their Own Spinoff
item.description: Enola Holmes and Watson divert from Doyle's source material, so it's only a matter of time until a Sherlock Holmes favorite gets their own spinoff.

item.title: 10 Biggest Panels To Look Forward To At MEGACON Orlando
item.description: MegaCon Orlando has a stacked lineup of panels, featuring guests from all corners of pop culture acclaim including movies, TV shows, and comics.
